name: Salomon Men Black Quest Sports Shoes
description:
Style Note
The salomon Quest 4D GTX boots is a heavy duty hiking shoe that performs well if you're a light/fast to medium hiker. The brand considered its trail-running shoe and used the design for a backpacking boot. A pair for the pros, this shoe provides great arch support and is roomy around the toes (unlike most hiking boots) The USP of this boot is its 4D Advanced Chassis that controls flex, reduces ankle strain, enhances stability and protects feet from rough terrain. The secure heel cupping enhances the stability of the boot and the lateral ankle support renders this pair great for climbing or descending. The shoe exhibits good traction on rocks, sand, landscapes with tree roots and grass furthermore, the sturdy rubber capping protects the toe against accidental stubbing while in the wild. Bottom line - this is a lightweight boot with excellent stability and support without the typical unwieldiness of hiking shoes. Weighing 649.2 grams, this is great for urban wear as well.

Product Details
Nylon textile and split suede upper with a high top, has a rubber toe cap and heel guard
Heel sling at the heel collar to prevent abrasion
High collar that steeps low at the ankle rear with ample padding
Padded tongue with a lace-lock, central nylon lace-ups with plastic eyelets and metal hooks
Polyester lining to wick sweat away with mesh lining for the collar and tongue upper
Waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane at the bootie lines for a dry and comfy feel
Removable Ortholite footbed engineered with anti-microbial treatment and is partially made of recycled tire and a molded EVA midsole
The 4D Advanced Chassis is made of thermoplastic urethane
4D stands for the four layers - the foam insole, the midsole support plate, a cushioning pad in the sole and the outsole
Contagrip outsole made of high wear abrasion resistant rubber which has an ascending lug pattern at the forefoot and braking pattern at the heel region

Material and Care
Leather, textile
Clean with a leather brush
Do not store under sunlight or wash

name: Salomon Men Black RX Prime Sports Shoes
description:
Style Note
The salomon RX Prime is a lightweight shoe designed to offer a cushioned ride, especially after a heavy duty triathlon or rock scrambling. The padded inner is designed to soothe the sole of your feet - what's more it features a 'Reelax' platform with OS muscle and OS tendon structure. Bottom line is that this is the best recovery shoe in the market, designed with the specific purpose of protecting your internal foot structure. It's a great 'before' shoe, wear it before that marathon you've trained for and after! name: Salomon Men Black Synapse Mid Sports Shoes
description:
Style Note
salomon comes up with its first ever natural motion hiking shoe - the Synapse Mid. This is not specifically a running shoe but performs excellently on various surfaces because of its Dynamic Traction technology. The aggressive outsole is designed from a high abrasion rubber compound, thanks to which the grip on these kicks is brilliant - an essential feature if you're hiking on rough terrain or scrambling up a rock. The Dynamic Ride and OS Muschle gives superior cushioning in this shoe and the OS Tendon running along the circumference of the outsole adds rebound to your stride (runners, note!) In summary, these shoes' USP is that its lightweight, with excellent support and speed-enhancing features (more so if you're descending a slope during a run) Need we mention that this sharp looking shoe definitely goes easy on the eyes?
